sentences.en: 'It isn't very important about the top hats,'said Winston patiently.
sentences.cn: “ 倒不是高礼帽有什么了不起, ” 温斯顿耐心说.

sentences.en: Dick was patiently explaining about soils and drains and native wages.
sentences.cn: 迪克耐心地解释土壤、排水和工人工资等事情.

sentences.en: He could never speak quite patiently to the old blockhead.
sentences.cn: 他实在无法很耐心地对这个老笨蛋说话.

sentences.en: He listened patiently to what we all had to say before putting across an alternative point of view.
sentences.cn: 在表述不同看法之前,他耐心地听我们的意见.

sentences.en: He patiently educated himself in this subject.
sentences.cn: 他坚持不懈地自修这门学科.

sentences.en: He reeled out his finshing line and waited patiently.
sentences.cn: 他放出绕线轮上的钓丝，耐心地等待。

sentences.en: He was content to bide his time patiently, waiting for the opportunity to approach her.
sentences.cn: 他乐于耐心等待接近她的良机。

sentences.en: John's dog padded patiently along beside him as he walked.
sentences.cn: 约翰散步时他的狗在他旁边耐心地跟着他慢慢地走.

sentences.en: Of course, the British will suffer such daily stresses patiently.
sentences.cn: 当然，英国人将会耐心地承受这些日常压力。

sentences.en: She patiently scrubbed the dirty marks off the wall.
sentences.cn: 她耐心地擦去墙上的污渍.

sentences.en: She waited patiently for Frances to finish.
sentences.cn: 她耐心地等弗朗西丝弄完。

sentences.en: She's waiting patiently in the fond belief he'll come back to her.
sentences.cn: 她在耐心等待,痴情地相信他会回到她身边.

sentences.en: Slowly, persistently, patiently, we will end this conflict.
sentences.cn: 慢慢来，耐心坚持，我们会解决这场冲突的。

sentences.en: Talk to him patiently to bring him round.
The expectant crowds in the streets waited patiently for the queen.
sentences.cn: 街上期待的人群耐心地等待着女皇.

sentences.en: The teacher told him to weigh this matter patiently.
sentences.cn: 老师让他耐心考虑这事。

sentences.en: They just have to wait patiently for the next post.
sentences.cn: 他们只好耐心地等下一批邮件。

sentences.en: Whenever we have trouble with our studies, our teachers help us patiently.
sentences.cn: 每逢我们在学习上遇到困难， 老师总是耐心辅导。
